snippet.title: The Falconeer | The Path Trailer 🦅  | Xbox Series X
snippet.description:
Generations of poisonous decisions and treason swirl in the deep, as factions collide... 

Coming soon to Xbox Series X and Xbox One 

Wishlist now: https://steamcommunity.com/app/1135260 
Pre-order the Day 1 retail edition: https://www.wiredproductions.com/products/the-falconeer 

Become the Falconeer and soar through the skies aboard a devastatingly powerful Warbird. Uncover secrets lost to the sea as you join or oppose different factions and clans scattered throughout the mysterious world of The Great Ursee. Take advantage of multiple Falconeer classes with individual stats, weapons and warbirds that can be upgraded through winning battles, completing quests, discovering secrets, or applying Mutagens or Chants. 

The Falconeer is an open-world air combat game, featuring fast, brutal aerial dogfights and deep exploration of an incredible fantasy open-world set not only above the clouds, but also amongst the waves and down through the sunken, ocean depths. 

The Xbox Series X Day One Edition Contains The Following Exclusive Content: 
- Reversible inlay 
- Falconeer lenticular 
- Sticker sheet. 
- Digital soundtrack, featuring stunning original music from award-winning composer Benedict Nichols, and Mikee W Goodman, of experimental tech metal pioneers, SikTh. 
- The digital Falconeer Game Guide - the ultimate guide to this incredible game.

#XboxSeriesX #TheFalconeer #XboxGamesShowcase
